block.p: BASEBALL

American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Optioned RHP Ramon Ortiz to Edmonton of the PCL. Recalled RHP Jarrod Washburn from Edmonton. MINNESOTA TWINS--Activated LHP J.C. Romero from the 15-day disabled list and optioned him to Salt Lake of the PCL. TEXAS RANGERS--Named Bobby Jones interim outfield instructor.
BASEBALL

American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Optioned RHP Ramon Ortiz to Edmonton of the PCL. Recalled RHP Jarrod Washburn from Edmonton. MINNESOTA TWINS--Activated LHP J.C. Romero from the 15-day disabled list and optioned him to Salt Lake of the PCL. TEXAS RANGERS--Named Bobby Jones interim outfield instructor.

National League MONTREAL EXPOS--Recalled INF Andy Tracy from Ottawa of the International League. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Claimed C Cesar King off waivers from the Texas Rangers and optioned him to Scranton/Wilkes Barre of the International League.
Atlantic League ATLANTIC CITY SURF--Signed OF Juan Rocha.
Northern League SIOUX CITY EXPLORERS--Signed LHP Leonardo Patino and RHP Josh Kuecker.
Western Baseball League SONOMO COUNTY CRUSHERS--Signed C Miguel Rodriguez. Released INF Rafael Ozuna.
BASKETBALL
Women's National Basketball Association CLEVELAND ROCKERS--Waived C Anita Kaplan and F Daunau Lobela. LOS ANGELES SPARKS--Waived G Kristin Clark.

United States Basketball League FLORIDA SEA DRAGONS--Signed F Antonio Reynolds-Dean and G Arthur Davis. Released C Chuck Roberts and F Lathon Nash. Placed G Carl Boyd and G Roberto Herrera on the inactive list. WASHINGTON CONGRESSIONALS--Released F-C Antric Klaiber.
FOOTBALL

National Football League CLEVELAND BROWNS--Signed DE Courtney Brown to a six-year contract and WR Zola Davis and DT Ryan Kuehl to one-year contracts. HOUSTON--Named Tom Throckmorton BLESTO scout. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS--Named Scott McCloughan director of college scouting.
Canadian Football League CALGARY STAMPEDERS--Signed LB Otis Floyd. WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS--Signed S Spencer McLennan.
HOCKEY
National Hockey League MINNESOTA WILD--Signed a two-year full affiliation agreement with Cleveland of the IHL.

American Hockey League AHL--Suspended Hershey RW Scott Parker for two games and Hershey D Sami Helenius for one game for receiving game misconduct penalties against Rochester on May 9. Suspended LW Frank Bialowas pending an investigation into an incident for which he was assessed a game misconduct penalty against Rochester. HARTFORD WOLF PACK--Signed RW Pavel Brendl.
West Coast Hockey League BASKERSFIELD CONDORS--Signed F Paul Willett to a three-year contract.
COLLEGE

ALABAMA--Named Brittney Ezell women's assistant basketball coach. BALL STATE--Named Sally Northcroft assistant field hockey coach. CAL STATE-FULLERTON--Named Barbara Erhardt women's assistant basketball coach. ELON--Announced Phoenix as its nickname. IONA--Named Harry Hart assistant athletic director for operations. IOWA STATE--Named Robin Becker women's assistant basketball coach. LAMAR--Named Joel Washington women's assistant basketball coach. MERRIMACK--Named Rick Edelmann assistant director of athletics. NORTH TEXAS--Announced the resignation of Steve Brickey, quarterback coach and offensive coordinator, to become quarterback coach at Iowa State. NORTHERN ARIZONA--Named Steve Shaff director of sports media relations. SAINT ANSELM--Announced the resignation of Bob Kerrigan, baseball coach. SOUTH FLORIDA--Named Harry Elifson women's assistant basketball coach. TEXAS-SAN ANTONIO--Announced the resignation of Mickey Lashley, baseball coach. XAVIER--Announced the resignation of Mark Gaffney, men's assistant basketball coach. Rescinded the scholarship of basketball junior F Aaron Turner because of academic shortcomings.SAN ANTONIO--Announced the resignation of Mickey Lashley, baseball coach.
